document.full_text: german martin kaymer is one of three players aiming to finish the week at the top of the world rankings but the u.s. pga champion believes briton luke donald deserves to be recognized as number one.
document.title: donald deserves to be world number one, says kaymer
lines_and_colors: german martin kaymer is one of three players aiming to finish the week at the top of the world rankings but the u.s. pga champion believes briton luke donald deserves to be recognized as number one.
